website_summaries.verdict: Skates made for youngsters learning figure skating with a toe pick. Multiple fun colors available.
pros: Good cushioning inside the skate, which allows youngsters to practice longer comfortably
Important to have toe pick for intermediate figure skating lessons
Convenient Velcro closures ensure fast on and off
cons: Toe pick may cause problems for first-time skaters

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner skates!  (order your sneaker size, even for boys)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beginner skates. My son loves them. They do run true to size so do not believe the product description that tells you to order up 1.5 sizes for boys. Order your regular sneaker size. Also, remember you will need to get them sharpened before you can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shipping service
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected, my nephew was excited to own a pair of ice skates. But the box arrived ripped open, including the inner bag. The box itself sat in Anchorage, Alaska for 11 days before reaching the destination, arriving over a week late.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fit Great for Wider Foot
customer_reviews.text: So I’m in love with these skates! So much to the point that I don’t consider them as beginner skates. The ankle support is great for new skaters as you can’t roll your ankle with the firm support. And the fur lining is nice and keeps the foot warm. But all in all the reason my daughter will ALWAYS only wear Riedels is because she has a wide foot with no arch! Jacksons will never fit her no matter where she is in her competitive skating career. So grateful to struck out on such a good quality well-made skate on my first try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and bright vibrant colors. My daughter loves them! Fits to size. Very soft and comfortable. My daughter always was getting sore and hurt feel from rentals but these were so comfortable she could skate and skate with no complaints. Easy to lace and easy on and off. They are so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole LoBianco

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates/ no laces
customer_reviews.text: Maybe because it’s a toddler 11 but the skates I got did not have laces, only Velcro. They seemed to fit well, I prefered laces to get the best fit but we’ll see how they do on the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality skates!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to tighten and seem to be warmer and more comfortable than typical figure skates. These run pretty true to size. Quality also seems high. I would suggest sharpening these before use.
customer_reviews.author: dbd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and warm. Easy to put on and wide as other reviews said. Most of the skates are white or boring gray (the rental ones) ... these really stand out, we love love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Papadia

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: My son is taking classes, these fit just as they are supposed to. He is doing great with them his instructor is happy with them and his progress.
customer_reviews.author: Glades Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct skate
customer_reviews.text: The skate that came was not the one in the photo. Even when the box came it showed a different skate than what was actually in the box. The one that came was velcro straps....
customer_reviews.author: Nyshi

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Easy on and off. Even has blade covers. Just beautiful. My granddaughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Great support over figure skates.
customer_reviews.text: Great skates for my 4 year old. Hockey style boot provides huge support increase over rental figure skates when first learning but still has advantage of figure skate blade with toe pick.
customer_reviews.author: H/D Mile Eater

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable skates!
customer_reviews.text: Got the skates for my son. He loves them and says they are comfortable. I would recommend taking them to get sharpened. They are perfect for the beginner skater!
customer_reviews.author: Goofymom

customer_reviews.title: My 6-yr old son loves these skates and I like the firm ankle support they provide
customer_reviews.text: My 6-yr old son loves these skates and I like the firm ankle support they provide. I think it's good for a little guy just beginning to skate.
customer_reviews.author: Potter Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of skates for my son!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of skates. My son loves the color. They work great except a little difficulty with lacing them around the plastic grips of the skates. But once laced, they work great
customer_reviews.author: lae

customer_reviews.title: Great first kids skates
customer_reviews.text: We switched from play-it-again junkers to these and suddenly my little girl could skate. Easy on and off too.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Widest Width Ice Skater In Mind
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a wider foot! If you have seen actual figure skates the foot bed is extremely narrow towards the top. My 5 year old genetics will never make it possible for her to wear the “classic” figure skated that retail for upwards of $400. But this brand has a much wider fit which is perfect price point and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No laces
customer_reviews.text: What we got doesn’t have laces at all. Not as described and it is a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jian Hua

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner skates
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 8 year old. He liked them and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: David Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first skates
customer_reviews.text: Plush inside, warm, thick and super supportive around ankles. My daughter absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Dagosti

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: these are so easy to get on & off little feet- they work great for beginners & advanced skaters.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kids skate.
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable and better control than the adjustable size skates.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Jansen

customer_reviews.title: cool skates
customer_reviews.text: My son's first pair of skates and he lives them. Easy to put on. I did orders size up as the other reviews suggested.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieMax

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Well made and they seem to be comfortable on my daughter. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Better than renting
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the skates and she feels confident when she is wearing them. Better than renting!
customer_reviews.author: heath_williams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Quality seems to be good. No problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, its fits my daughter perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 6 year old daughter and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: selvakumaran

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: These skates are great for beginners. The boot is soft and unlike figure skates, the haveva thinsulate lining that keeps my daughter’s feet nice and warm! She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good skates
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and adjustable. My son is very picky about footwear. The inside is warm and soft. A bit hard to tie. But I guess all skates are like that.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old loved these skates!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wore these for the first time and said they were very comfortable. As she is a novice skater, and is just starting lessons, I was nervous. She said these were amazingly better than the rental skates. She skated for over an hour and a half in total comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good recreational skates
customer_reviews.text: Good recreational ice skates, my friend bought these for his kids
customer_reviews.author: Valeriia and Andy

product_meta.title: Riedell Skates - 615 Soar Jr - Youth Soft Beginner Figure Ice Skates
feature_bullets: STAYS COMFORTABLE FOR ENDLESS USE - These youth ice skates have a simple closure system to keep your feet feeling fresh. These soft figure skates provide comfortable skating with their foam-backed velvet lining. Check Sizing Chart for best fit.

GIVES YOU OPTIMAL SUPPORT - This ice skate set offers light support to keep you stable on the ice while allowing for freedom of movement. These boots have a split tongue design and durable maintenance-free uppers. Support rating is 20 (Scale 1-100)

DESIGNED TO KEEP YOU SAFE & YOUR FEET DRY - These beginner youth ice skates have with safety in mind by adding extra padded linings for cushion. Designed with a lightweight PVC sole, these boots keep your feet dry for hours of use.

GREAT FOR THE BEGINNER OR CASUAL SKATER - These recreational ice boots offer the perfect amount of support for the new beginner or casual skater. The 615 Soar Jr. gives a great performance whether on a rink or on a pond.

VERSATILE BLADE FOR ANY USE - These Riedell ice shoes come with stainless steel blades that give you a smooth glide on the ice. By offering great handling and speed, these skates work for all styles of recreational skating.
